docs.lead_paragraph: Felicitaciones to T Magazine's erstwhile cover star, Penélope Cruz, on her best supporting actress Oscar win last night. In the video above she talks about "Vicky Cristina Barcelona" and mentions the one thing she wants most after attending the Academy Awards - a cheeseburger.

docs.snippet: The setup of the auditorium at the Kodak Theater made it much easier for the celebrities to mingle Golden Globe-like during commercial breaks, making them very lively and chaotic....
docs.lead_paragraph: The setup of the auditorium at the Kodak Theater made it much easier for the celebrities to mingle Golden Globe-like during commercial breaks, making them very lively and chaotic. Mickey Rourke sat on the edge of the stage, kicking his legs over the side during several breaks, with a stage manager coming to shoo him back to his seat as the show returned from commercials.
docs.abstract: The setup of the auditorium at the Kodak Theater made it much easier for the celebrities to mingle Golden Globe-like during commercial breaks, making them very lively and chaotic.
